Asst. Manager / Sr. Executive - Accounts & Finance : Les Bleus Ltd. (Delifrance) Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Les Bleus Ltd. (Delifrance) Asst. Manager / Sr. Executive - Accounts & Finance Application Deadline : 11 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 25 to 45 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 12 Jan 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 25 to 45 years Responsibilities & Context Monthly Financial Reporting: Prepare and share monthly Profit & Loss (P&L) statements, financial summaries, and analysis with management. Sales Reconciliation & Data Management: Handle sales reconciliation, ensuring alignment between sales data, collections, inventory, and system reports. Maintain accurate day-to-day financial data. Cash Flow Management: Monitor and manage cash flow, ensuring proper fund planning, liquidity management, and timely payments. Budgeting & Forecasting: Prepare and support yearly budget planning, forecasting, and variance analysis in line with business goals. Accounts Operations: Maintain proper books of accounts, vouchers, ledgers, and documentation. Ensure accuracy in purchase, expense, and inventory accounting. MIS & Management Reporting: Prepare MIS reports, dashboards, and financial analysis for management review on a regular basis. Cost & Margin Control: Monitor product costing, margins, and expenses, particularly relevant to FMCG / food products. Cross-functional Coordination: Coordinate with sales, supply chain, and operations teams for financial alignment and data accuracy. Audit & Compliance: Support internal and external audits, VAT, tax, and statutory compliance as required. Ensure adherence to company policies and accounting standards. Skills & Expertise Accounts and Finance Cash Flow Management Cost and profit analysis Financial Reconciliation VAT and Tax Compensation & Other Benefits Salary Review: Yearly Lunch Facilities: Full Subsidize Festival Bonus: 2 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Company Information Les Bleus Ltd. (Delifrance) Follow Address: ABC House, 9th Floor, 8 Kemal Ataturk Avenue, Banani, Dhaka 1213, Bangladesh Website: https://delifrancebd.com/ Business: Délifrance Bangladesh is a globally renowned French bakery and café brand, operated in Bangladesh by Les Bleus Ltd., the official master franchise holder.
Originating from France, Délifrance is known for its authentic French baking, including premium croissants, artisan breads, pastries, cakes, and café cuisine.
Established in Bangladesh in 2020, the brand has expanded across multiple locations in Dhaka.
A state-of-the-art central kitchen ensures consistent quality, freshness, and food

Manager - International Sales, Export & Commercial : A Reputed Group of Company Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List A Reputed Group of Company Sr. Executive/Asst. Manager - International Sales, Export & Commercial Application Deadline : 11 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 27 to 40 years Location: Dhaka Published: 13 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 27 to 40 years Responsibilities & Context Maintain proper communication with existing and potential customers to assess their needs. Collect the production volume/stock reports and communicates with customers to receive orders based on the availability of the products. Monitor competitor activities and industry trends in order to identify business opportunities into the specific geographic area. Find out the potential markets and creating relationships with the new buyers. Ensure necessary contract negotiation with the buyers and ensure all terms and conditions are met accordingly. Issuing PI (Proforma Invoice) and amending as & when needed. Overseeing pre- to post-sales support activities for the designated goods & taken feedback from buyers. Ensure on-time delivery, follow-up shipment, and payment process. Coordinate with the internal and external stakeholders to ensure smooth customer service. Able to handle export documentation and its related process. Drafts B/L and receives Master B/L from Forwarder. Collect LC From Bank. Prepare Export Documentation as per LC/PI/SC/TT. Prepare Bank documents, Commercial invoices, Packing List, SAFTA, Certificate of Origin, issue EXP, etc. Take permission from the respective authority for exporting Dangerous Goods. Collect BL document, Shipping certificate, SAFTA certificate EPB certificate. Prepare payment acceptance or disposal report. Communicate with Factory, C&F, Freight Forwarder, VAT Department, Bank & Concern Department for documentation. Check & Follow-up Day on day payment receipts with the billing & sales department. Skills & Expertise Customer relationship marketing Leadership and Good Communication skill. Numeric skills Problem solving and analytical skill Sales target Customer Service Compensation & Other Benefits The competent candidate will be awarded attractive remuneration and other facility as per company policy. Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Job Highlights The company is contributing to earning foreign currencies by selling its chemical products to the overseas market. To ensure significant growth the company is looking for dynamic Sales Professionals for its Int. Sales, Export & Commercial team. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At least 40 years Responsibilities & Context Capacity Forecasting: Analyze factory capacity (machine and manpower) against order projections to ensure 100% utilization. Order Allocation: Strategically allocate styles to specific sewing lines based on complexity and operator skill sets. TNA Management: Monitor the Time & Action (TNA) calendar for every order, ensuring cutting, sewing, and finishing stay on track for shipment dates. Resource Planning: Review and approve requirements for machinery, folders, attachments, and specialized equipment before bulk production starts. Line Balancing: Oversee Industrial Engineering (IE) teams to optimize line layouts and minimize bottlenecks in the sewing hall. AQL Standards: Ensure all production lines adhere to the required Acceptable Quality Level (AQL) . Zero-Defect Culture: Implement "Right First Time" (RFT) quality protocols to reduce rework and reject rates. Compliance: Maintain a factory environment that meets international social and safety compliance standards (e.g., WRAP, BSCI, SEDEX) CMT Analysis: Work closely with the merchandising team to provide accurate Cut, Make, and Trim (CMT) costings. KPI Tracking: Monitor critical metrics including: Cut-to-Ship Ratio: Aiming as close to 1:1 as possible. DHU (Defects per Hundred Units): Aiming for continuous reduction. Responsibilities & Context Medical Assistant, Skin Therapists are experts in therapeutic facial and body care, with a strong understanding of key body systems, skin biology, anatomy and cosmetic chemistry. Using this knowledge, Skin Therapists provide a range of Medical/non-medical face, body treatments customized to a client`s needs, and recommend appropriate products and after-care. While Skin Therapists can perform therapies to address specific conditions such as acne, Acne Scar, Spot, Dead Cells, Wrinkle, Anti-aging, Pores, fine lines, face and body contouring, they do not diagnose these conditions. A Skin Therapist will work with a range of equipment and products, such as performing microdermabrasion or using Light based devices, and must be trained in their correct usage and handling to perform these treatments safely. Perform different skin care treatment procedure with state of the art machines available at Bio-Xin Cosmeceuticals Skin Care Clinics. Treatments involve face and body care includes Acne, acne scar, dead cells, spot, wrinkle, fine lines, permanent hair removal, body and face contouring etc. As a Skin Therapist, you would spend time with people and help them talk about their skin related problems and feelings. job_description: Merchandiser / Sr. Merchandiser (Denim & Non Denim Item) : H&F Fashion Ltd. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List H&F Fashion Ltd. Merchandiser / Sr. Merchandiser (Denim & Non Denim Item) Application Deadline : 11 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 35 to 50 years Location: Dhaka (DOHS Mirpur) Salary: Tk. 40000 - 65000 (Monthly) Published: 12 Jan 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 35 to 50 years Experience Requirements: The candidate should have 8–10 years of practical experience in garment and apparel buying and manufacturing, with proven exposure to major international retail brands such as Costco, H&M, and ZARA. Must have experience in Buying House and Garments Manufacturing. Strong communication and organizational abilities Honest, responsible, dynamic, and self-driven Fluent in English Proficient in MS Office, Email & Internet Responsibilities & Context Key Job Responsibilities: Oversee the full garment production cycle—from product development through bulk production to final shipment—ensuring strict adherence to buyer quality standards. Maintain and manage all merchandising communication, including order files, status reports, and tracking documentation. Control order specifications, costing breakdowns, and communication with suppliers and foreign liaison offices. Prepare and execute detailed T&A (Time & Action) plans in coordination with buyers and factories. Supervise sample development with a focus on timely submission and quality consistency. Possess hands-on knowledge of both knit and woven garment manufacturing processes. Ensure timely sourcing and approval of fabrics and trims, maintaining required quality levels. Conduct regular factory visits to ensure production aligns with buyer expectations. Ensure all raw materials are received well before the PCD (Planned Cut Date). Coordinate closely with production and QA teams to secure on-time shipment and 100% quality clearance. Lead and guide a team of merchandisers, offering direction and problem-solving support. Oversee complete order execution—from initial sampling to final dispatch. Continuously monitor T&A progress and follow up to maintain deadlines. Prepare accurate cost reconciliation reports upon order completion. Analyze shipment results and take corrective actions to minimize rejections. Meet key KPIs, including units shipped, revenue growth, margin improvement, and market-share stability. Submit regular performance updates and analytical reports to management. Skills & Expertise Buying House Garments Industry Textiles & Garments Maintaining Suggested by Garments Garments Maintaining Merchandising Textiles & Garments Maintaining Compensation & Other Benefits

To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 26 to 32 years Strong command over Bangladesh Labor Law (BLL-2006) and Labor Rules 2015. Excellent conflict resolution and mediation skills. Technical Skills: Proficiency in MS Office (specifically Excel for database management) and Bengali typing. Ability to work under pressure and manage large groups of workers effectively. Responsibilities & Context We are seeking a highly motivated and disciplined Executive - Administration for our RMG factory. This role focuses heavily on factory floor management, worker staffing, and maintaining organizational discipline. The successful candidate will ensure that the factory operates with a full workforce and adheres strictly to the company`s code of conduct and labor laws. Key Responsibilities Worker Recruitment: Lead the recruitment process for floor-level workers (operators, helpers, etc.) to meet production targets. This includes sourcing, interviewing, and verifying documents. Disciplinary Action: Handle all disciplinary matters according to Bangladesh Labor Law. This includes issuing show-cause notices, conducting domestic inquiries, and managing grievance handling procedures. Facility & Asset Management: Supervise the overall cleanliness, maintenance, and repair of the factory premises. Maintain an updated inventory of all fixed assets. Compliance & Licensing: Coordinate the timely renewal of all legal licenses, including Trade License, Fire License, Factory License, and Environment Clearance. Security & Safety: Supervise the security team to ensure the safety of the premises and staff. Oversee fire safety protocols and emergency evacuation drills. Transport & Logistics: Manage the company’s transport pool, including vehicle scheduling, maintenance, and fuel monitoring. Vendor & Procurement: Handle administrative procurement (stationery, cleaning supplies, etc.) if needed and manage third-party service providers. Canteen & Housekeeping: Ensure the hygiene and quality of food in the workers` canteen and maintain high standards of housekeeping across the production floor. Liaison: Maintain effective communication with local authorities (Police, Pourashava) and the local community. Skills & Expertise Disciplinary Action Factory Administration Worker Recruitment Compensation & Other Benefits Medical allowance,Mobile bill,Insurance Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize Salary Review: Yearl

Efficiency Metrics: Track and report on Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) such as: DHU (Defects per Hundred Units) EBITDA at the plant level OTD (On-Time Delivery) percentage. Resource Management: Manage budgets for labor, overtime, and machine maintenance. Production Scheduling: Oversee the Master Production Schedule (MPS) to ensure all sewing lines are optimized and downtime is minimized. Capacity Planning: Analyze factory capacity against incoming orders to determine if subcontracting is necessary or if additional shifts are required. Lead Time Management: Manage the entire "Cut-to-Pack" process, ensuring woven garments which often require complex washing or finishing move through the facility without bottlenecks. Technical Troubleshooting: Provide solutions for difficult woven constructions, such as specialized pocketing, collar setting, or seam sealing. Machinery Innovation: Evaluate and recommend new sewing technology (e.g., automated pocket welters or template sewing) to reduce manual labor and improve precision Quality Management Systems (QMS): Implement and oversee rigorous AQL (Acceptable Quality Level) standards at the end of sewing lines. Compliance: Ensure the facility meets international social compliance standards (WRAP, BSCI, SEDEX) and buyer-specific ethical audits WASH Coordination: Since many woven products require heavy processing, coordinate closely with the laundry/washing department to ensure shrinkage and shade continuity. ১) বিদেশ গমনের ভিসা ২) ম্যানপাওয়ার স্মার্ট কার্ড ৩) কন্ট্রাক্ট পেপার এবং রিলেটেড ডকুমেন্টস ৪) আকামা ৫) তাকামুল সনদ পত্র প্রার্থীদের কর্ম-সংশ্লিষ্ট বিষয়ভিত্তিক প্রতিবেদন লেখার দক্ষতা থাকা বাধ্যতামূলক। আগ্রহী প্রার্থীদের আদর্শবান, সৎ চরিত্রের অধিকারী ও কর্তব্য পালনে দায়িত্ববোধসম্পন্ন হতে হবে। গ্রাম/প্রত্যন্ত অঞ্চলে দরিদ্র মানুষের সাথে বা প্রান্তিক জনগোষ্ঠীর সাথে কাজ করার মানসিকতা থাকতে হবে । বাংলাদেশের যে কোন স্থানে কাজ করতে ইচ্ছুক থাকতে হবে। কম্পিউটারে ওয়ার্ড, এক্সেল, পাওয়ার পয়েন্ট, বাংলা ও ইংরেজি টাইপিং, ইন্টারনেট ব্যবহার এবং মাইক্রোফিন-৩৬০ (ডাটাসফট) সফটওয়্যার জানা প্রার্থীদের অগ্রাধিকার দেওয়া হবে। Responsibilities & Context সেন্টার ফর কমিউনিটি ডেভেলপমেন্ট এসিসটেন্স (সিসিডিএ) এমআরএ কর্তৃক সনদপ্রাপ্ত (সনদ নং : ০১০৩২-০১৭৮৮-০০২৪৫), পিকেএসএফ, বিভিন্ন ব্যাংক এবং দাতা সংস্থার আর্থিক সহায়তায় পরিচালিত জাতীয় পর্যায়ের একটি দরিদ্র বান্ধব, অরাজনৈতিক এবং অলাভজনক উন্নয়ন সংস্থা । সংস্থার ক্ষুদ্রঋণ কার্যক্রম পরিচালনা ও সম্প্রসারণের লক্ষ্যে উল্লিখিত পদে সৎ, যোগ্য ও পরিশ্রমী বাংলাদেশি নাগরিকদের নিকট হতে আবেদনপত্র আহ্বান করা হচ্ছে । Skills & Expertise Suggested by Microcredit NGO Project Management Report Writing Compensation & Other Benefits T/A,Mobile bill,Provident fund,Gratuity Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize Salary Review: Half Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 বেতন-ভাতাদি : যোগ্যতা ও অভিজ্ঞতার ভিত্তিতে আলোচনা সাপেক্ষে বেতন নির্ধারিত হবে। অন্যান্য সুবিধাদি : চাকুরি স্থায়ীকরণের পরে নিচের সুবিধাসমূহ প্রাপ্য হবেন: বার্ষিক বেতন বৃদ্ধি। উৎসব বোনাস (বছরে ২ টি) ও বৈশাখী ভাতা। প্রভিডেন্ট ফান্ড, গ্রাচ্যুইটি (নীতিমালা অনুযায়ী প্রতিপূর্ণ বছর চাকুরির জন্য সর্বশেষ মূল বেতনের সর্বোচ্চ ৪ গুণ) ও কর্মী কল্যাণ তহবিল। লাঞ্চ ভাতা, মোবাইল বিল, মোটরসাইকেল জ্বালানি ও রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ ভাতা (প্রযোজ্য ক্ষেত্রে )/ভ্রমণ ভাতা। চিকিৎসা অনুদান, মৃত্যু/দূর্ঘটনা জনিত (বীমা সুবিধার ন্যায়) আর্থিক সহায়তা। সন্তানদের জন্য শিক্ষা ভাতা। সংস্থার নীতিমালা অনুযায়ী বাই-সাইকেল/মোটরসাইকেল ক্রয় বাবদ সুদবিহীন ঋণ সুবিধা সহ সংস্থার বিধি মোতাবেক অন্যান্য সুযোগ সুবিধা প্রয

To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements 3 years of experience in fabric marketing, sales support, or RMG supply chain roles, preferably with knit fabrics. Basic knowledge of RMG buyer requirements (GSM, colorfastness, shrinkage) and emerging sustainable dyeing trends.​ Good communication and organizational skills for client interactions and event support (BGMEA/BKMEA). Proficiency in MS Office, data analysis tools, and basic CRM systems. Willingness to travel locally for client visits and trade fairs in Dhaka RMG areas. Responsibilities & Context Job Context This entry-to-mid-level role supports B2B marketing efforts for knit fabrics in Bangladesh`s RMG sector, assisting with client outreach, market research, and event coordination to help secure orders and build buyer relationships. The position involves executing marketing tasks aligned with RMG demands like colorfastness, GSM accuracy, and shrinkage control, while coordinating with production and sales teams.​ Key Responsibilities Assist in developing B2B marketing plans based on RMG trends, knit fabric buyer specs (e.g., colorfastness, GSM precision), and export priorities. Support relationship-building with RMG clients through visit coordination, presentation preparation, and feedback collection to aid repeat orders. Help conduct market analysis on RMG buyer needs, competitor knit fabrics, and trends like eco-friendly dyeing to support product positioning.​ Participate in BGMEA/BKMEA trade events and buyer meets, showcasing knit fabrics and networking with garment exporters.​ Coordinate with production, sales, and R&D teams to track fabric availability, new developments, and RMG order timelines. Assist in budget tracking, B2B lead monitoring, client retention data, and preparing performance reports with insights. Gather RMG buyer feedback on knit specs (e.g., shrinkage control, reactive dyeing) to contribute to quality improvements. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Market Research B2B Marketing Presentation skill Sales Support Event Management Compensation & Other Benefits Festival Bonus: 2 Salary Review: Yearly We offer excellent work environment, attractive compensation package and performance-based career progression as per company policy. The Maersk group employs around 100,000 employees across operations in 130 countries. We actively promote the growth of the communities around us, allowing local economies to flourish. APM Terminals operates one of the world's most comprehensive port networks. We’re uniquely positioned to help both shipping line and landside customers grow their business. APM Terminals is looking for a Project HSE Manager to lead the project Health, Safety, and Environmental (HSE) discipline for the development and construction of a greenfield container terminal in laldia, Chattogram, Bangladesh. In this leadership role, you will oversee the planning, implementation, and continuous improvement of Health, Safety, Security and Environmental (HSSE) strategies at the Laldia Project. You will ensure full compliance with local legislation, corporate standards, and industry best practices to safeguard people, property, and the environment. Your key metric will be to drive everyone to a higher level of engagement on HSE and proactively adres issues before they arise with a positive HSE mindset. The project involves a full greenfield development, followed by the transition to a live terminal. The HSE Manager will serve as a proactive client representative, collaborating closely with contractors and the Engineer to help make this one of the safest construction sites—and later, one of the safest operational terminals—in Bangladesh. Executive - IT Procurement : STARDUST Telecom Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List STARDUST Telecom Limited Executive - IT Procurement Application Deadline : 12 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 21 Jan 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Responsibilities & Context Job Summary Stardust Telecom Limited are looking for an IT Procurement professional responsible for sourcing, purchasing, and managing IT hardware, software, network equipment, security solutions, and related services. The role requires close coordination with vendors, service providers, internal IT teams, and finance to ensure timely procurement, cost control, compliance, and uninterrupted IT operations. Key Responsibilities IT Procurement & Vendor Management Procure IT hardware including laptops, desktops, monitors, printers, servers, networking devices, CCTV, access control systems, and related accessories. Purchase licensed software, subscriptions, and renewals such as Microsoft licenses, security solutions, SSL certificates, and network services. Manage procurement of consumables such as toner cartridges, drums, cables, and spare parts. Identify, evaluate, and negotiate with vendors, suppliers, ISPs, and service providers to ensure competitive pricing and service quality. Service & Contract Management Coordinate annual maintenance contracts (AMC) for printers, PABX, network systems, software, and IT services. Handle service bills for IT-enabled services, internet connectivity, data center services, CDN, IP transit, bandwidth, and peering services. Manage renewals, security deposits, service charges, and monthly or annual IT service invoices. Network, Security & Infrastructure Procurement Procure and manage network infrastructure including switches, routers, firewalls, access points, racks, PoE devices, and cabling. Coordinate procurement for internet links, IPLC, IX, bandwidth upgrades, port charges, and data center services. Support security infrastructure procurement including CCTV systems, access control devices, firewalls, and endpoint security solutions. Asset & Documentation Management Maintain accurate procurement records, purchase orders, invoices, delivery notes, and asset registers. Track IT assets, warranties, service history, and lifecycle status. Ensure compliance with internal procurement policies and audit requirements. Coordination & Support Work closely with IT operations, network teams, and project teams to understand technical requirements. Coordinate repairs, replacements, relocations, and upgrades of IT equipment and network infrastructure. Support IT projects by ensuring timely availability of required hardware, software
